item.description:
Correction on the prices and time:

They will hold a block of seats for us under the name "Neil's meetup group" until 7:30 PM, so we all need to pay for our tickets by then.

If we get 10 people for the group rate, it will be $14 per ticket.
If we don't qualify for the group rate, you can use the discount code (I'll email you that after you RSVP) for $16 per ticket.
The regular price is $18 per ticket.

I'm listing this event with 4 meetup groups.

See www.madco.org

Here's their description of this show:

Live from Hollywood! It’s Christmas Eve and Judy Garland has invited a star-studded list of celebrities to ring in the holidays – Ethel Merman, Bing Crosby, Liberace, Joan Crawford – and more! But Judy’s outrageous comeback special enters a twilight zone when a mysterious stranger crashes the party – taking one and all on a mystical journey beyond legends and legacies….

“Magical! A Side-Splitting Musical Parody…Wickedly Funny!” – Los Angeles Times

"A Non-Stop Hoot!" – Backstage West

This award-winning original musical was developed in New York, premiered in Los Angeles and performed in Chicago and other cities around the country. Music and Drama Company's special holiday presentation is a New England premiere, directed and choreographed by Portsmouth’s multiple-Spotlight award winner, George Hosker-Bouley. "JUDY" will light up the Court Street Theatre for five performances only!

JUDY'S SCARY LITTLE CHRISTMAS
a holiday special

written by Jim Webber and David Church
music and lyrics by Joe Patrick Ward (TV's "Sordid Lives")
musical direction by Jed Holland
directed and choreographed by George Hosker-Bouley

“Wonderfully Strange!…A True Holiday Treat!” – Hollywood Reporter

“Hilarious! A surreal snow globe highball; a Hollywood Christmas card from beyond the grave!” – Portland Mercury

Hilarious, Outrageous, Nostalgic, and even a bit Spooky, JUDY'S SCARY LITTLE CHRISTMAS is “A Glistening Christmas Gift!” (Frontiers Magazine), “An Instant Holiday Classic!”

"Woe to your Holidays if you miss it!" - Burbank Leader

50% profits from this production donated to BRIDGES domestic and sexual violence support organization.

ACCESSIBLE SEATING: All Row AA seating is fully accessible for patrons with accessible seating requirements.

Restrictions:
Some material may be inappropriate for young audiences.
item.how_to_find_us: Let me know if you don't already know me and I'll think of something.
item.name: Comedic Musical Theatre
